text: If you were still alive, I'd still be shooting

text: Well, Traxex, aren't you the gloomy one.

name: wind_rival_01
text: I guess we know who's the better archer now.

name: wind_rival_02
text: Sorry, Clinkz, I can offer archery lessons if you'd like.
text_simple: sorry clinkz i can offer archery lessons if youd like

name: wind_rival_03
text: That's some fancy icebow you have there, Drow. In your dead hand.
text_simple: thats some fancy icebow you have there drow in your dead hand

name: wind_rival_04
text: Enchantress, you're too cute to kill. Just stay back and hide next time.
text_simple: enchantress youre too cute to kill just stay back and hide next time

name: wind_rival_05
text: Enchantress, you're so perky. Or you were before I killed you.
text_simple: enchantress youre so perky or you were before i killed you

name: wind_rival_06
text: I'm loathe to kill another ginger, but for you I made an exception.
text_simple: im loathe to kill another ginger but for you i made an exception

name: wind_rival_07
text: Your tiny featherless arrows can't hurt me, Sniper.
text_simple: your tiny featherless arrows cant hurt me sniper

name: wind_rival_08
text: Careful, Ursa, it's bow hunting season.

name: wr_arc_focusfire_dam_04
text: Maybe I was shooting the same holes I'd already made...
text_simple: maybe i was shooting the same holes id already made

name: wr_arc_focusfire_dof_02
text: I'm surprised they even lasted that long.
text_simple: im surprised they even lasted that long

name: wr_arc_focusfire_failure_03
text: Ya know, sometimes I could just...
text_simple: ya know sometimes i could just

name: wr_arc_focusfire_failure_04
text: That was a warm-up. Gotta keep loose.

name: wr_arc_focusfire_noa_02
text: Might notta needed that here. But it was fun.

name: wr_arc_focusfire_noa_03
text: They don't all fall that fast...

text: Good thing I don't get tired.

name: wr_arc_powershot_failure_01
text: There's a first time for everything.

name: wr_arc_rival_301
text: The string of my bow draws only at my command.
text_simple: the string of my bow draws only at my command

text: A target's a target. Doesn't matter how it moves.

name: wr_arc_shackl_failure_01
text: Did I forget to tie that one?

text: Did I get into some rope mites?

text: Well that wasn't much of a shackle.

name: wr_arc_shackl_failure_08
text: It's not the end of the world...
text_simple: its not the end of the world

name: wr_arc_wheel_all_02
text: The best I can do is make it worse.
text_simple: the best i can do is make it worse

name: wr_arc_wheel_all_03
text: Want me to put you out of your misery?
text_simple: want me to put you out of your misery

name: wr_arc_wheel_all_04
text: Hold really still. You've got a bug on your face.

text: Ever seen an arrow punch through plate iron? Wanna?

name: wr_arc_wheel_all_08
text: Here, hold this apple in your mouth.

name: wr_arc_wheel_deny_01
text: I can't help but hate you right now.
text_simple: i cant help but hate you right now

name: wr_arc_wheel_deny_02
text: What'd I do to deserve this?
text_simple: whatd i do to deserve this

name: wr_arc_wheel_deny_03
text: Must have hit pretty close to the mark to get 'em all riled up like that.
text_simple: must have hit pretty close to the mark to get em all riled up like that

name: wr_arc_wheel_thanks_01
text: A begrudging respect is the best I can give ya.

name: wr_arc_wheel_thanks_02
text: May campfire smoke blow forever away from your face.
